item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="home"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Welcome to your Bluehost SPOKE Portfolio site! We are excited to have you aboard and would like to help you make this site a meaningful representation of who you are, and how you work. The preloaded content that you decided to install will help direct you to where you can go to customize your site to fit your needs. This theme provides you with a couple of menus designed around organizing your site to represent you properly. These menus can be changed by entering your wordpress dashboard, then clicking on Appearance > Menus, then in the upper right hand corner, you would click on 'Manage Locations'. A brief description of each menu navigation is included below: "--Select a Menu--" The dropdown menus for Top Primary Menu and Secondary Menu should already have "--Select a Menu--" selected when you arrive on the page. Since no menu from the dropdown menu is selected, a default menu is being used by Wordpress. This default menu is designed to provide you with a structure that showcases 3 areas of your life.
  • The 'Portfolio' navigation menu allows you to showcase your education.
  • The 'Experience' navigation menu allows you to showcase your professional experience and skills.
  • The 'About me' menu allows you to showcase your personal life and interests.
  • The 'Blog' menu allows you to continually reflect upon your education, and gives you a historical archive of this learning.
Alternative Menu You can activate the Alternative Menu by selecting it from the dropdown menus for Top Primary Menu and/or Secondary Menu. The Alternative Menu is designed to provide you with a structure that promotes strong personal branding, showcasing the very best of you in a way that is easily accessible and highlighted at the right levels.
  • The 'Portfolio' navigation menu allows you to showcase all of your best work, making it a place for a presentation of the greatest parts of you.
  • The 'Coursework' menu is designed specifically as a repository for course requirements or assignment responses across all of your classes.
  • The 'About Me' menu allows you to present all other facts about you that would apply to any online collaboration, including your resume, work experience, hobbies and interests, skills, and any other items of interest that you would like to share.
  • The 'Blog' menu allows you to continually reflect upon your education, and gives you a historical archive of this learning.
On the 'Home' page, you can post links to yourmostrecentand impressive work -- the kind of contentthat you are proud of and would likevisitorsand employersto see first. What would make you shine that you can place on your homepage. To exchange this page with the content you want to showcase, login to your Wordpress dashboard, go to the upper left hand corner, and hover over your site's name until you see the 'View Site' link appear. Click on that link. It will take you to your home page. You will see a gray/black overlay at the top of the screen. Click on the 'Edit page' link, and remove this content, replacing it with your home page content. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Portfolio
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: Use this page to list some of your most impressive and noteworthy projects and experiences. Some visitors may only get as far as this page before leaving, so make sure you put in the time to make this page represent you well. Example: Thank you for visiting my portfolio site. As a student/Alumni of the University of Business and Technology, I am excited to share what I have learned and how it applies to my community and to the world as a whole. At UBT we are invited to share what we have learned and gathered through our experience with those around us". [Make the rest of the content rich with multimedia, photos/videos] -- i.e. - http://c-league.bluehostspoke.com/ For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site.

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: An Example of "About Me" page: "I am a student at the University of Business and Technology. We will become what we strive to give to this world. Our goal is to give what we learn and what we live. I have chosen to include information about " In order to modify or change the content of this page, please go to your site homepage, add /wp-admin to the end of the URL in the address bar, and login. then come to this page again, and click the edit link at the top of the page or in the body of this page below modify the title and content of this page. For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site. If you want to update the name of this page: - Click on "Pages" tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to update the name of it. - Click on "Edit" - Edit the name of your page If you want to Delete this page: - Click on "Pages" tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to delete - Click on "Trash"

item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded:
Here you can either post a video of you or write something about yourself! See the example below:

Showreel 2008 HD from Peter Roe on Vimeo.

OR "This section of my portfolio is dedicated to projects for UBT school that I have submitted in response to the assignments for my courses. These projects are a reflection of what I have learned and how I have applied it life as I know it". ------------------ If you want to update the name of this page: - Click on "Pages" tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to update the name of it. - Click on "Edit" - Edit the name of your page If you want to Delete this page: - Click on "Pages" tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to delete - Click on "Trash"   For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site.

item.title: Reflection
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: Here you can install any Gallery plugin you would like from the Plugins area. So, you can upload all the photos or pictures you want on this page. Here are some suggestions for good Gallery Plugins you can install on your website here or on any page you would like it to be on. Plugins: -Wordpress Gallery Plugin -Photo Gallery:http://www.nextgen-gallery.com If you want to update the name of this page: - Click on "Pages" tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to update the name of it. - Click on "Edit" - Edit the name of your page If you want to Delete this page: - Click on "Pages" tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to delete For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site. - Click on "Trash"

item.title: Most Recent Project
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: This is an example of where you would place your most recent project. These projects are designed to keep your visitors up to date with what you are studying and the results of what you have learned. To Upload files here: - Click on Pages in the left-hand menu in WordPress - Select Edit below the title of this page (or simply click on the title). - When the edit page loads,click on Add Mediathats located just below the subject line. -From there, you can choose from files you have already uploaded (Media Library) or use Upload Media to upload new files from your computer. - Once your file is uploaded, click Insert Into Page on the bottom left-hand corner of the screen. If you want to update the name of this page: - Click on Pages tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to update the name of it. - Click on Edit - Edit the name of your page If you want to Delete this page: - Click on Pages tab on the left-hand side of the Dashboard - Look for the Page that you want to delete - Click on Trash For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site.

item.title: Resum
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: Here you can upload your Resum as a pdf format oryou can copy and paste it here on this page, whatever you prefer to do. [spiderpowa-pdf src="http://sample.bluehostspoke.com/english/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/rsample1p.pdf"]rsample1p 1. Instructions on how to upload your resume in a pdf viewer: (As shown in the example above) - First, install and activate "Spiderpowa" plugin, from the plugin area under the "Dashboard" - Click on "plugins" tab under "Dashboard" - Click on "Add New" tab - Type in "Spiderpowa" in the search box - Click install and then activate. - Second, click on "Resum" page. - Click on "Add Media" button here on this page under the Subject area - Then click on "Upload Files" under "Insert Media" - Choose the pdf file from your computer - Finally click "Insert into page" Now whenever you upload a pdf file on any page, it will look like the example above because you installed the plugin. 2. Advanced: Use the Shortcode You can also embed a pdf using the spiderpowa shortcode. To do this, simple edit the page using the Text editor and type the following code: To find the link to that pdf, go to Media/Library and then click on the pdf file from the list (or click "Edit" under the correct file on the list). The URL for the pdf will be grayed out on the top right below "File URL:" Copy that link and paste it into the shortcode and your file will appear on the page like the pdf at the top of this page. 3. Instructions on how to upload your resume as a link: - Click on "Add Media" button here on this page under the Subject area - Then click on "Upload Files" under "Insert Media" - Choose your file from your computer - Finally click "Insert into page"

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: Some themes come with Contact pages built-in. If this is the case, you can make a page with a standard "Contact Form" just create a page called "Contact" (if you haven't already) and select "Contact" or "Contact Page" in the Template drop-down menu that's in the "Page Attributes" box on the right-hand side of the page editor. If your theme doesn't have a contact page template included, you can install the Contact Form plugin to add the same (or even better) functionality. - Just go to Plugins/Add New in the Wordpress menu and search for "Contact Form". - Contact Form should be the first option, and you can install and then activate it. - "BWS Plugins" will become a new menu item in your Wordpress menu, and after clicking on it you can add/change the email address where you would like to receive messages and edit fields that you want to appear on the contact form. [contact_form] Or, you can post your contact information on this page: Example: You can always reach me directly through phone or email at the following location: or you can upload your picture instead! Name:[YOUR NAME] Email:youremail@example.com Phone:000-000-0000 Thank you for visiting this site. Feedback is always welcome. It increases our awareness, and opens up opportunities for greater collaboration.

item.title: Coursework
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: As it is titled, you would be able to use a section like coursework to publish pages highlighting work completed as part of your major, minor, or elective courses. Pages can be organized into classes or areas of emphasis, and you can also highlight Milestones and/or large projects not included in your Portfolio section. In order to modify or change the content of this page, please go to your site homepage, add /wp-admin to the end of the URL in the address bar, and login. then come to this page again, and click the edit link at the top of the page or in the body of this page below modify the title and content of this page. item.title: Skills
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: "Skills" is a page or a collection of pages where you can highlight specific competencies that you have developed. Are you skilled in video-editing, spreadsheets, calligraphy, drawing, debate, data entry, group management, or web design? Let your visitors know specific areas where you can contribute to a company or team. For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site.

item.title: Project Showcase
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded:
If you were to share your best work with the world, you would place it here, where it can showcase the quality of work that you do. You would want to place a milestone from one of your classes, or a project that really showcases your skill set. Make it your best work. Use multimedia in this showcase. If it is an article, or textual project, include an audio clip narrating it, or a picture or video that can summarize your work well in a single picture of video clip. The Internet is a powerful tool for extending the use of multimedia to achieve greater effectiveness. To remove this content and replace it with your own, simply...
  • visit this page while logged in to your site, and click on the 'Edit' link that appears
  • go to your Dashboard > Pages, browse for the page 'Recent Project', remove all content, and replace with your content.
For more information on how to add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site. We look forward to seeing your showcase.

item.title: My last project is done!
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: I just finished my final project and I'm done for the semester. Good times ahead now that I have that big class out the way. At least I was able to make this ePortfolio blog so I could express my feelings about it somewhere. item.title: On the Job - Reflection
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded:
Here's an example of a reflection piece about an internship that you may have had. Blog posts are flexible - write about whatever you like. They are also greatly enhanced by multimedia: Over the summer of 2013 I was able to intern as a logistics assistant at trade shows for hardware, wedding , and automotive specialty products. Walking the path worn in the grass and beat through the leaves of the brush; Where burial coaches enter the arched gates of a cemetery; Where the sundown shadows lengthen over the limitless and lonesome prairie, ill-doingor loss or lack of moneyor depressions or exaltations, I felt its soft joltsone leg reclined on the other. I am an old artillerist, and tell of some fort's bombardmentand am there again. A few fell at once, shot in the temple or heartthe living and dead lay together, To niches aside and junior bending. The bugle calls in the ballroom, the gentlemen run for their partners, the dancers bow to each other; The sharphoofed moose of the north, the cat on the housesill, the chickadee, the prairie-dog.

I am integral with youI too am of one phase and of all phases. I think I could turn and live awhile with the animalsthey are so placid and self-contained, Nor do I understand who there can be more wonderful than myself. Talkative young ones to those that like themthe recitative of fish-pedlars and fruit-pedlarsthe loud laugh of workpeople at their meals, She owns the fine house by the rise of the bank.

item.title: Community
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: "Community" is a page where you can highlight local projects, volunteer work, or other community-related work that you have been involved in. Let employers know that there is more to you than your job and your class assignments. For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site.

item.title: Hobbies/ Interests
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: This page gives you the chance to showcase what you like to do in your spare time: TV shows you follow, sports you like to play, books you read, MineCraft castles you've designed, whatever. Everyone has a hobby. Regardless of whether it's a New York Times crossword, or the suspension bridges you build in your backyard, it's often what you do when you have time off that can bring you close to your friends and colleagues. For more information on how to edit this page and add multimedia, feel free to watch Bluehost's 7-part Wordpress Series, our video on Wordpress Themes, and tutorials for adding images, video, audio, slideshows, and plugins to your site.

item.title: Latest Job Showcase
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: This is where you want to highlight your job responsibilities and accomplishment. Show how it helped you learn, develop new skills, or qualify you for future positions. e.g. - Project Manager - City Water Containment Example: I recently finished a project for Company 1 where I was in charge of a team of 12 workers tasked with modifying the city's water containment facilities. We were able to modify all piping to PVC, from the galvanized metal that it had historically, and extend the lifetime of the equipment for another 100 years. I was responsible for...   Additional examples:

item.title: Application of Learning
item.dc:creator: Bluehost SPOKE
item.content:encoded: In order to modify or change the content of this page, please go to your site homepage, add /wp-admin to the end of the URL in the address bar, and login. then come to this page again, and click the edit link at the top of the page or in the body of this page below modify the title and content of this page.
